The '''Natlan Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Natlan]], allowing players to access the [[chest]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Natlan.

<!--? Natlan Shrine of Depths Keys are obtainable, allowing the player to unlock every shrine in Natlan.
-->
==How to Obtain==
===Statues of the Seven===
{{Main|Statue of The Seven#Natlan}}
* Level 2 Reward
* Level 4 Reward
* Level 6 Reward
* Level 8 Reward

===Tona's Flame's Restitution===
{{Main|Tona's Flame's Restitution#Rewards}}
* Level 8 Reward
* Level 18 Reward
* Level 28 Reward
* Level 38 Reward
